DOC.detailed_description: The propose research design prospective randomize control trial . Patients normal ovarian reserve , would expect reasonable outcome vitro fertilization , serve subject . Embryos patient randomize either static dynamic culture . They culture blastocyst stage embryo development biopsied preimplantation genetic screening . The best chromosomally normal embryo culture group select transfer complete double embryo transfer subsequent frozen embryo transfer cycle follow month .
DOC.criteria: Infertile woman seek vitro fertilization treatment aneuploidy screen Patient eligible twoembryo transfer compliance ASRM guideline Patient able undergo frozen embryo transfer cycle month follow vaginal oocyte retrieval procedure Maximum day 3 Folliclestimulating hormone level ( ≤12 IU/L ) Antimullerian hormone level ≥ 1.2g/mL , test within previous year ≤1 prior fail IVF cycle Male partner > 100,000 total motile spermatozoon per ejaculate ( donor sperm acceptable ) Body Mass Index ≤ 32 Antral Follicle Count ≥ 8 Diagnosis endometrial insufficiency define prior cycle maximal endometrial thickness ≤ 6mm , abnormal endometrial pattern ( failure attain trilaminar appearance ) , persistent endometrial fluid Use oocyte donation Use gestational carrier Medical contraindication double embryo transfer Use testicular aspiration biopsy procedure obtain sperm Presence hydrosalpinx communicate endometrial cavity Any contraindication undergo vitro fertilization gonadotropin stimulation Single gene disorder require detailed embryo genetic analysis
